item.description:
This movie starts at 4:15, it is 3D only. It looks like we are going to Hillside Pizza after the movie. The movie is only 86 minutes long, so that gives everyone time to make plans for later in the evening.

A.O. Scott of the NYT panned this movie;

http://movies.nytimes.com/2012/03/02/movies/dr-seuss-the-lorax-with-ed-helms-and-danny-devito.html?scp=1&sq=lorax&st=cse

However, my neighbor said it was much better than the review ("amazing" was his opinion).

If I remember correctly, the original had a heavy environmental/(lack of) corporate responsibility theme. I have the original on VHS, at some point maybe we can compare the two.

Gene
item.how_to_find_us: Near the pinball machine in the theater's arcade.
item.name: Dr. Seuss' The Lorax, Saturday, 3/10, 4:00PM
